name: I Stand With Ukraine
description:
I am astounded by the bravery of the Ukrainian people! The country is united as a close-knit family, civilians destroying orc's invader tanks by throwing Molotov cocktails on them. And this art I dedicated to the brave Ukrainian people! 


Flag + Hand with Molotov cocktail = Heart; represents courage, heroism, and defending the land.


The artwork is free, use as you wish: as a sticker, poster, patch, etc.


P.S. if you want to support Ukraine at least with your creativity, you can submit your works at: CreativesForUkraine.com
